name: Smashing Pumpkins (iDunnyX)
description:
It's Halloween and Johnny wants  to trick! Throw pumpkins from the bridge and hit the cars. Avoid cop cars though. Don't want them to ruin your fun.

W - Move up

S - Move Down

Space - Drop Pumpkins

Decided to join October 4th at about 5PM EST. Terrible decision so I couldnt bug fix to much. The main bug I have caught to far is sometimes when you  go to throw a pumpkin it vanishes and and reappears in your hands.
